snippet: President François Hollande called the killing of a French journalist in Syria an “odious act” and paid tribute to “all the journalists who pay with their lives for their commitment to freedom of the press.”
abstract: France's Pres Francois Hollande calls killing of French journalist Yves Debay in Syria an 'odious act' and pays tribute to 'all journalists who give their lives for their commitment to freedom of the press.'
lead_paragraph: President François Hollande called the killing of a French journalist in Syria an “odious act” and paid tribute to “all the journalists who pay with their lives for their commitment to freedom of the press.”

headline.seo: France: A Tribute to a Fallen Journalist
headline.main: France: A Tribute to a Fallen Journalist
headline.print_headline: France: A Tribute to a Fallen Journalist
